content: This carries over to New Game Plus too, as you can upgrade your Drinks even more, but even more Awoken Wine Worms will be needed, so you will have to recollect them all in your New Game Plus run.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jade_Essence.md', within the main section titled 'Jade Essence'.
The content is as follows:
This carries over to New Game Plus too, as you can upgrade your Drinks even more, but even more Awoken Wine Worms will be needed, so you will have to recollect them all in your New Game Plus run.
